WaveChallenge.Challenge_Bronze_HalfScore_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="4eaf24b442064ceea00c81ce8e62c56a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Your Dandori...goes well.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Bronze_HalfScore_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="3d22031ba29e4540a43bb21c6e8dac3c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]Transport...more and more.
For good Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Bronze_HalfScore_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="8e93e1535dcc437c9b46b6a24d042e34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]That way. Keep doing that.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Bronze_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="5b4a203e7edc4c13ab974878226dfaf0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]You have good...Dandori!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Bronze_01: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="1044b8be5cb04875b2e581f9988c5c17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Surprise"/]You beat...my record!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Bronze_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="3333f7581a564606a20ddfc8dbd308e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]You passed... Have a bronze medal!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Silver_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="b782d71c8b4741bbaf8470883ed82f08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]Now you get...a silver medal!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Silver_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="c567d7b0226e4c1bb69e8a1c4e8af60d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Surprise"/]Your Dandori mastery...
It is something to behold.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Silver_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="9fae975901684f70ba10d947cd3538f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]Amazing Dandori! So satisfying.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Gold_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="036a8382211f4c85888e0edee554862f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Surprise"/]So this is...gold-medal Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Gold_01: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="934bd445fd8447d693246c1c6d1a680c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Surprise"/]I've never seen...such Dandori!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Gold_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="4495a518add54ba3af79a8808cde6fa4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]You are...a Dandori genius!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="5d4e0acae91f4abc90765672fa09477f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Glad"/]Come. Time for Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="2e7ccb0646744adca9d5bf4419160ef2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Command"/]Throw your all...into Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="2ce09674fc78495286dedf09dedb1d14" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Command"/]Show me...your best Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_LastOneMin_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="8cf7e49d9a4d495ea521ef35cd6f8343" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Never give up...on Dandori. Go to the end.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_LastOneMin_01: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="4937d02fc3604fac8abd9af55d459c73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]There's not much...Dandori time left.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_LastOneMin_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="29ddde01712143b3be679f8d7a6c8a68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Command"/]Hurry... Hurry...
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Enliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="6e867b3e8367450da333823d6d0dc587" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Division of labor...is important for Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Enliven_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="5ab6d3727aaa40e9aa8916e293a346d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]Gathering Pikmin...
That is the foundation of good Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="bacd3a5c1455413cb8571a3dac4044b8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]Plan carefully...where to work from.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Enliven_03: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="cbc187a3705b49579e48a7742def3a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Repeat Dandori...for good practice.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Enliven_04: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="727b22afaafd4a75a279f2904e3cb43f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Don't leave Pikmin...standing idle.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Enliven_05: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="e297f31677b54741af0c634717d28b2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]Steady progress is...also good Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_GetItem_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="be722b8f53474309a6ff8aaf06b53b19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Use items...for best Dandori.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_GetItem_01: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="5919108fb78d4706a2edf2804a372acf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Think hard...on where to use items.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_HaveItem_00: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="d8802ededc264507b7384268e5e5b19c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It's exciting...to see when you use items.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_HaveItem_01: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="d171919e6d574a7f82d960113e077d62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Don't let items in pack...go to waste.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="cfc5996559f84a2bad3bda2c526456b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Sad"/]Don't give up...
[Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Rouse them...and continue Dandori!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_SeijinDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="f45227bb336a4147a47ec0d3d1f70377" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yare"/]You got...knocked out?
[Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]But Dandori...isn't over!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_DogDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="95a2a55594a54513a61a282448b472d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Sad"/]Don't give up...
[Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/]Rouse them...and continue Dandori!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_DogDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="cce090bcb547435eb6df229aeec91ee2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yare"/]You got...knocked out?
[Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Talk"/]But Dandori...isn't over!
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave003: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="c8165b603a1f4adbb3b83ecfd620e866" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Consider next Dandori...while you work.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave008:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="8650e5a563b44e1d87e8722744eeeb1d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]So busy with Dandori...
Could use extra hands...
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave029:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="b2249cfd37994c6987fc0d9c37f50192" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Rock Pikmin are hard...
No piercing...or squashing.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave015:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="afad5cd5f9e3495496834613708dc1fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Don't let Rock Pikmin...get bored.
Have them transport...
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave034: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="a7d0e03f927b40c195fe8e04b57f3ab6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Freeze swamp...so it won't slow you down.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave031: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="c7b49d7d63f64618a0f4e08832fe5872" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Only freeze water...when really needed.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave027:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="24f21f14d1744408a836dec37b050a5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Toggle moving walkways...
Then can transport faster.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave028: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="72c1ed049def4150907624d6d6eb4975" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Use a fire starter...to melt ice.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave030:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="211be83f9c364d938dc6503a3d1bab09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's OK to ignore creatures...
Focus on other tasks.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave017: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="94a662107cc4408697729364107ef57a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Go ahead and...take charge of switches.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave020: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="65eed3669dab4df1938d88b24b346a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Climb the cliff all at once...or bit by bit?
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Advice_Cave032:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="fbd574481d5646dda7a049251f408a79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Defeat creatures that spew poison...
You can beat them with your dog too.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Pikmin_ZenmetuAllLost_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="4bf8734474aa48fe9914fbcc8985642b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Sad"/]Pikmin. All lost...
[Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Question"/]Can you...go on?
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Pikmin_ZenmetuAllLost_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="b076d2a8fd2f45079d3b40c1a67c786a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yare"/]Pikmin are...no more...
[Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Yes"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Try again[System:Color name="Default"]...from the beginning.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Happy_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="cc11b0af47124a4e9079789c209efeeb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Restless dog. In trouble.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Happy_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="82222d0dec574382a6c54d6e7d07ff88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Dog upset. Cannot finish transport.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Pikmin_GuruGuru:
[Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="76c283d4a7da42af96eabadc3a91acd1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Pikmin go round and round...
Dandori no good.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Avatar_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="f1d022c566ea4ed18c2353790bb476a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You cannot...go that way.
WaveChallenge.Challenge_Avatar_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="SceneNpc"/][UE:Meta key="b66ace402962417da06c6ccaee569c8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]No way on... Cannot transport.
